label: AB2C2_tP5_123_b_e_ac-001
title: Mn$_{2}$Co$_{2}$C Structure
comments: We have inferred the value of $a$ and the positions of the atoms from Figure 2(a) of (Holtzman, 1959) and Figure 3 of (Murthy, 1969), shifting the origin to be on the Mn$_{II}$ atom.  The value of $c$ was inferred from the C-Mn$_{II}$ distance given in the paper.  This is a pseudo-cubic lattice, with $c/a \approx 1$.
